summary: The <leader>ac sync mechanism reads from ~/.config/.claude/ (a stale copy) instead of ~/.config/nvim/.claude/ (the active repo), causing 63 outdated files. Additionally, context scanning misses .json/.yaml files, and output/systemd directories are not scanned at all. The top-level CLAUDE.md is also not synced.

artifacts.summary: Analysis of <leader>ac sync mechanism failures: stale global source, incomplete file type scanning, unscanned directories, and 5 specific fix recommendations

next_steps: Run /plan 44 to create implementation plan for fixing the sync mechanism
